title: 2008 Belgian Super Cup
text: The 2008 Belgian Super Cup is a <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> match that was played on 9 August 2008, between league winners <a href="Standard%20Li%C3%A8ge">Standard Liège</a> and cup winners <a href="R.S.C.%20Anderlecht">Anderlecht</a>. Standard won 3–1.
